tracks.title: Track 2
Seed
tracks.lyrics:
I need a lot of loving

Just to pull me through

I need a lot of loving

Just to see me through

The best seed ever sown

You’re the only love I’ve ever known

I nearly caught the tears

Running down your face

I needed to see them fall

But you turned your head away

If I’d known what I know now

I’d have dried them up somehow

Ah, still it keeps growing

Through the flood and through the drought

Ah, still it keeps growing

Through the tears and through the doubt

The best seed ever sown

You’re the only love I’ve ever known

I need a lot of loving

Just to pull me through

I need a lot of loving

Just to see me through

The best seed ever sown

You’re the only love I’ve ever known

tracks.title: People call it love
tracks.lyrics:
The page is white the words have yet to fall

That all of my life fell so freely

From eager lips fall the lustful lies

Why now should you believe me

People call it love

People call it love oh I know

People call it love

A lonely room No matter who is there

Nothing to share when I’m without you

Now I don’t know the words I heard you use

Were they for real or only platitudes

Another life so far I had to come

So long the road I had to travel

Now at last my time is nearly done

And soon we’ll be together

And now I’ve found this pure emotion

To you I’ll send it with devotion

Love be the wings to speed you on your way

Home to me from far across the ocean

People call it love oh I know

This will be a place
Where you can have
The lyrics of a song

Formating may need to be
Something to work on...
tracks.title: Track 1

tracks.title: Track 2

HUM01.title: Origin of the Species
HUM01.label: Houndsman Records
HUM01.description: A short description of Origin of the Species

tracks.lyrics:
I heard you crying out

For the one you love

And you know that I’ll come running

Baby, if you call my name

I was having such a good dream

Till you woke me up

I heard you crying out

For the one you love

It’s another day in Paradise

It’s another day when no-one else can see your pain

It’s another day in Paradise

It’s another day for love to go walking in the rain

Take a little walk

I heard you crying out for the one you love

Just another day

Just like any other day
tracks.title: Another Day

tracks.lyrics:
The boy says, where’s my Papa?

The man says he got fifteen years

The boy says, where’s my Mama?

Son, she’s out on the street, yeh

Boy, are you a man yet?

The man said, you know a girl is a woman

When she got a list of demands

She make you wipe your feet and brush your teeth

And wash your hands yes she will

Boy, are you a man yet?

There’s no hurry to grow up

No rush to push the tide

In no hurry to grow up

No rush to push the hands of time

Just shooting a gun don’t make a hero

Never too young to learn to fight

Just shooting pool don’t make a zero

Learn the difference between wrong and right

Boy, are you a man yet?

No, no, no!
tracks.title: Boy, are you a man yet?

tracks.lyrics:
Cruising

Cruising with the cats in Summertown

Stray cats blasting on the stereo

Cruising with the rag top down

All dressed up with no place to go

Just cruising with the cats in Summertown

Too too cool too too cool oh yeh

Too too cool too too cool

In my two-tone E-type, number TC1

I can catch any game on the street

And when Officer Dibble plays piggy in the middle

I’m not the one who feels the heat

Cruising

Cruising with the cats in Summertown

Cute little pussy sitting on my lap

Purring like a V8 machine

Grinning like a Cheshire while she takes a nap

Can you spot the cat that got the cream?

Cruising

Cruising with the cats in Summertown
tracks.title: Cruising with the cats in Summertown

tracks.lyrics:
Mr Green he make I mellow

Take away all my anxiety

Sista Sinsi keep I mellow

Rest my weary head on her pillow and

No tears are falling from my eyes

All my troubles falling from my mind

I just must trust gravity

To keep my feet on the ground

Some of the time

While my spirit spreads its wings to fly

High

Some people say the novelty fades

It’s never as good as the first time

But right now I don’t need the thrill

I’ll make do with the chill

Smile and say I don’t mind

I don’t mind
tracks.title: Keep I mellow

tracks.lyrics:
Every time we need a volunteer

To do the dirty work

Who draw the short straw?

Every time there’s a dastardly deed to be done

No fun

Who draw the short straw?

So here I go pouring out my heart to you

‘Cause somebody had to do it

So here I go tearing your heart in two

‘Cause nobody else would do it

It’s a big bad world and you gotta be tough

And when we come to get going

Sometimes the going gets rough

It’s a mad sad world but we wanna laugh and play

So we need a volunteer to fight the good fight

And save the day

Every time there’s a crisis

Who draw the short straw?

Any unpleasant surprises that need cleaned up

Who draw the short straw?

Every time we let the fires get out of control

Who draw the short straw?

When there’s bullets to be dodged

Who draw the short straw?
tracks.title: Short Straw

tracks.lyrics:
Teddy cut a dash in a mighty stylee

His quiff and his creepers and his fine red drape

But the skinheads didn’t think so highly

When they pounce in the alley Teddy no escape

Would ya run, would ya fight, would ya fall

With a knife in your back

Poor Teddy do nothing to provoke such a hateful

And mindless attack

But to dress up in his favourite style

It make him stand out a mile

And we waved him bye-bye and we waited by and by

But Teddy never coming back

Teddy was a charmer, never caused no harm

Had a smile on his face all the time

And the Rudis and the Rockers and the Rastas all dug him

But the Skinnies cut him down in his prime
tracks.title: Teddy cut a dash

tracks.lyrics:
Get you hat and your coat now, boy and put your boots upon your feet

Get out your door and step out on to the street

He see the sun rise morn day after day

He watch the sun set eve night after night oh yeh

He sit and watch the grass grow

He watch it through his window

He listen to the wind blow

It blows upon his window

Boot up Buddha Billy

Boot up and put your foot down

Boot up Buddha Billy

You gotta eat to survive and there’s mouths to feed

You gotta pull your weight now, boy, or you’ll find out soon enough

You can’t put food on the table

By contemplating your navel

You gotta stand up on your own two feet now

You gotta boot up Billy, shake your big Buddha butt, yeh!

Hey Buddha Billy you’re such a little know it all

You’re all talk and no walk did you even learn to crawl

Hey little know it all Hey little know it all Hey little know it all

Get up and get out

Hey, boot up Buddha Billy

Boot up and put your foot down

Stomp it down
tracks.title: Buddha Billy

tracks.lyrics:
My father was a proud coal miner

Just like his father before

So when I turned sixteen and it came my time

I went to work in the mine

Down in a hole

A pick and a shovel, a bucket and a cart

Down in the pits where the blackness fills my heart

Blasting the rocks, dragging the coal

Night follows night and the blackness fills my soul

Down in a hole

Oh, working down in Monkton Hall

Then Maggie come and stomp on the unions

Police wading in with their truncheons

All we ask’s a decent wage, stop treating us all as slaves

To be whipped and cast into the dungeon

Down in a hole

Oh Son, you’re going down in a hole

Like you father before you

Down in a hole

Grandfather

Down in a hole

Just like Maggie now

Down in a hole
tracks.title: Down in a hole

tracks.lyrics:
When you take your first breath breathe deep

When you take your first step walk tall

When you speak your first words let them hang in the air

And just like that breath of fresh air

You breeze into my life

Straight into my heart with a love at first sight

Girl I love your style

Yes, I love the way you move

Girl I love your eyes

When they’re looking into mine

And every day you look a little better

And every day I love you more and more

And every day you look a little better

And every day I love you more and more
tracks.title: Every Day

HUM03.title: Little Munki
HUM03.label: Houndsman Records
HUM03.description: A short description of Little Munki

tracks.lyrics:
While the tears are running

Water falling from your eyes

All the feet are running

Wings filling up the sky

Oh, what if they stumble and fall

I’ll be holding on

While the fires are burning

In the cold light of dawn I’ll be holding on

While the tears are running

Why are you running and why are you

Falling not flying oh

What ever the reason I’ll hold on

While the tears are running

You rise to meet the challenge

Without ever looking down

Walk tall on your high wire

While I stay rooted to the ground

Oh, I’ll be the net if you fall

I’ll be holding on

While the fires are burning

In the cold light of dawn I’ll be holding on

While the tears are running
tracks.title: Holding on

tracks.lyrics:
He’s the Joe who always asks for more

He’s the John who always leads them on

He’s the Jack who never gives it back

He’s the Jim who steps out on the limb

He talks big says he’s a revolutionary

He walks tall so it goes right over my head

He spreads the word he’s a god-damned missionary

But I never caught a word he said

He’s the man takes his woman by the hand

From the desert to the promised land

The grass was greener but before too long

He’s the man who’s gotta mow the lawn

He The Man

And where there’s a plenty

Plenty will follow

And where there’s a Pit

Plenty will fall

He leads by example he leads from the front

He leads into battle with his chest puffed out

He can’t stand authority he’s a sheep gone astray

He was shot in the back as he was running away

He The Man
tracks.title: He the Man

tracks.lyrics:
Is it right?

It’s keeping me awake each night

Is it right?

You know I hate to be so uptight

Tie me down

Rob me of my innocence

Why don’t you shoot me down?

Stripped of all my false pretence

I keep running from you

Night and day

But in reality

I’m drifting aimlessly

All you law makers and law breakers

Check it out

Is it right?
tracks.title: Is it right

tracks.lyrics:
At the age of five you send your little children off to school

You get them stand in line and walk in two by two

But not all little children want to obey the rules

Some wanna think for themselves some wanna play the fool

Seven years of primary five years of secondary

Felt like doing time in a kiddie penitentiary

I’m not a sheep you can clone

I‘ve got a mind of my own

I can run when you want me to walk

I can walk when you want me to run

Come little Munki don’t run little Munki

Obey the rule stop playing the fool

Are you deaf little Munki dumb little Munki

Send you off to school walking two by two
tracks.title: Little Munki

tracks.lyrics:
I got a constant chit-chatter

Going on in my mind

I gotta find some respite

From all that’s going on in my mind

It takes a special kind of someone

To make you feel good inside

It takes a special kind of love

To make up for all the pain you hide

And you’re so special

You’re the kind I need to find

Hey, you’re so special, hey, you’re so kind

Hey, you’re the pain killa for my mind

I got all these tingles

Rushing around my body

I got all these feelings

Rising up inside

I’ve forgotten all my trials

And tribulations

I gotta find a way

To keep you here by my side

Pain Killa
tracks.title: Pain Killa

tracks.lyrics:
Hey, Mister Beat Master come on count me in

Just show me the start and I’ll be there to the end

Hey Mister Tub Thumper I’ll dance to your beat

Just keep thumping your tubs with your hands and your feet

Hey Mister Beat Master you can count me in

Where you lead me, my brother, I’ll follow, my friend

Yes, where you lead me, my brother, I’ll follow, my friend

You’re my brother from another mother

But I ain’t trying to take the place of your other brother

‘Cause we both got mothers and we both got brothers

But you’re my brother from another mother

When the dark demons come to lead you astray

Endure it my brother endure it my friend

And you can’t face the night that follows the day

Endure it my brother endure it my friend

When hands of fate come to pull you apart

Endure it my brother endure it my friend

And love is so cruel that it’s broken your heart

Endure it my brother endure it my friend

And it’s no consolation all good things must end

Endure it my brother endure it my friend
tracks.title: Seumas

tracks.lyrics:
She looks so sweet

Butter wouldn’t melt in her mouth

But when she has a little drink

Her inner devil comes out

He feels so proud just watching her move

He’s up there on the stage laying down a groove

But he get hot under the collar when she get too loose

Start dancing on the tables and showing off her goods

Oh no she’s winding up the rude boy

Oh no she ain’t gonna stop

Oh no she’s winding up the rude boy

She said Simma down Rudi what she say?

Simma down Rudi put your shackles away

Simma down Rudi what she say?

Simma down Rudi

She said I don’t mind you calling me a ball and chain

You know I like to be tied down every now and then

But don’t you start bitching it’s too hot in the kitchen

If you want to satisfy her, boy, don’t put out the fire

Simma down Rudi
tracks.title: Simma down Rudi

WOOF001.title: Pillarbox Swing
WOOF001.label: Hovis Records
WOOF001.description: A short description of Pillarbox Swing

tracks.title: Until the real thing comes along
Eldorado
tracks.lyrics:
Way out on the deep blue yonder

Lies my destiny

Fill my heart with wonder

And set my spirit free

But I’m never gonna find my Eldorado

As long as I stay here with you

I’m never gonna make it to the Promised Land

Until my wondering days are through

It’s not for the money

The gold or the jewels

It’s for the milk and the honey, Honey

When I find my way home to you

It’s a world-wide world of wonder out there

As far as the eye can see

Full of dreams of wealth and beauty

And lies and inhumanity

No, I’m never gonna find my Eldorado

Stuck here in Paradise with you

I’m never gonna make it to the Promised Land

Until I’ve tasted the forbidden fruit

No, it’s not for the money

All that gold wouldn’t do me no good

Without the milk and the honey, Honey

When I finally get home to you

Way out on the deep blue yonder

tracks.title: Out in the rain
tracks.lyrics:
If you turned up too late to see

Your Baby waiting so patiently

She was ok, till half past five

By six the tears were in her eyes

Don’t ever leave your loving out in the rain

In case it shrink or dissolve

Don’t ever leave your loving out in the rain

It might never fit you again

The daily chains that weigh you down

The endless chores, the far from merry-go- round

They close in just like a noose

Till you’re hanging on your own excuse

Don’t ever leave your loving out in the rain

It might never fit you again

tracks.title: Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy?
tracks.lyrics:
I got a baby with a big brown puppy dog eyes

Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy

She always get what she want and she wantin’ it all the time

Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy

Sometimes I get a little weary sometimes a little bit tired

Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy

But tonight I’m willing, tonight I’m able, tonight I’m more than ready to satisfy

Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy

I’m gonna rock my baby, roll my baby

Hold my baby till she screams out maybe

I’m gonna hold my baby tonight

My baby’s got a baseball bat, she gonna lay me flat, if I don’t clean up my act

Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy

She’s young and long and lean and strong and she got everything a guy could want

Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy

Sometime she so pettin’ sweet and sometimes just scratchin’ & bitin’

Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy

Drag me to the left, drag me to the right, this way that way, till I’m downright uptight

Whatcha gonna do about it Daddy

I’m gonna tease my baby, please my baby

Squeeze my baby till she screams out maybe

I’m gonna squeeze my baby tonight

Rock roll hold

Tease please squeeze

I’m gonna hold my baby tonight

Yeh !

tracks.title: Fragile Love
tracks.lyrics:
A fragile love

Needs a touch soft and gentle

A fragile love

Soft words sentimental

If you’re strung out if you’re strung out

I’ll gather you in

If you’re wrung out feeling hung out

I’ll understand

I’ll build you up to make you strong

Find the will and way to keep on keeping on

I’ll build you up from your fragile condition

I’ll tend you gently with my loving intention

My sweet and gentle fragile love

The next hurt always comes along

Before the last hurt has been and gone

Sticks and stones and aches and pains

Why has life become so accidental

When you’re lying, or denying

I’m always taken in

And when you’re crying, I’ll be trying

To make you smile again

A little slip, push come to shove

That’s all it takes to break my fragile love

A little slip, too small to mention

Finds itself in another dimension

My sweet and gentle fragile love

I’ll build you up to make you strong

Find the will and way to keep on keeping on

I’ll build you up from your fragile condition

I’ll tend you gently with my loving intention

My sweet and gentle fragile love

This will be a place
Where you can have
The lyrics of a song

Formating may need to be
Something to work on...
tracks.title: Track 1

tracks.lyrics:
This will be a place
Where you can have
The lyrics of a song

Formating may need to be
Something to work on...
